rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that leads to the main living space. Complies with Vastu principles by having an open plan.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchenette
rooms.description: Combined space for dining, relaxation, and small cooking area. Adaptable layout meets modern aesthetics while ensuring efficient flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (Studio Bedroom)
rooms.description: Spacious studio bedroom with a built-in balcony for natural light and ventilation. Positioning aligned with Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 (Servant's Quarters)
rooms.description: Functional servant's quarters with privacy and essential amenities.
